q: Union officials last year opened a formal antitrust probe into Google search results, while in href="http://topics.bloomberg.com/china/"> China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries. Things have been stable since June in China, when Google had its business license renewed, Eric Schmidt said today.`` But you never know; it's possible for the government to cause us to not work.'' The cocoa market is under the influence of the one-month export ban imposed by newly elected president Alassane Ouattara of Ivory Coast, the world's largest cocoa producer, analysts at Commerzbank said in a note to clients.`` The sale of cocoa beans abroad accounts for a quarter of Ivory Coast's export revenues,'' they added.||+27( 0)
